Text:
These vinyl uploads sound AMAZING! Thank you for the time and effort! Great selections and great taste. Thank you!

Taking requests? Got any Leonard Cohen? Nick Drake? Bob Marley? Miles Davis? CSNY? Even Def Leppard's Pyromania album?
i'd love to help you, but i have none of those reocrds lol, but i'll keep an eye out. i'd love to have some bob marley for sure :D
Request: How about The Beatles '65 'Help!' Album? 'Let It Be' sounds fantastic by the way. Good job.
